description: Returns a list of all tags associated with the specified Amazon Keyspaces resource. To read keyspace metadata using ListTagsForResource, the IAM principal needs Select action permissions for the specified resource and the system keyspace.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Keyspaces resource.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token to specify where to start paginating. This is the NextToken from a previously truncated response.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag. Tag keys are case sensitive. Each Amazon Keyspaces resource can only have up to one tag with the same key. If you try to add an existing tag (same key), the existing tag value will be updated to the new value.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag. Tag values are case-sensitive and can be null.
